page.title: 06SCHOOLYARD GAMES IN WINLATON
page.content:
TUGGY ON BLACK SQUARE.Two ten year old girls made this up in 1984.They use squares of tarmac outside the old toilets.Someone is 'ON'and everyone else is on a black square.We run between squares and the person who is 'ON' has to tug someone before they reach another square. The person tugged is then 'ON'.
KINGO. The king drops the ball into the centre of a circle of children.They flick the ball with their feet around the circle. Eventually the ball goes through someones legs and that person is 'ON'. The punch, punches the ball as far as possible and the person who is 'ON' runs to get it. He or she hits the rest of the people with the ball. When everyone has been hit the game ends.
